author: danielf
msg: Continued refactor CoreUtil, so that its different products: Settings, (Avalon) Context, BeanFactory, Logger and Cocoon can be created independently. This is needed for setting up blocks and in general for making the setup less monolithic.

author: frankb
msg: Add some supporting methods to enable EMFless codegen pattern prototyping

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-514 Integrate upgrade tests into test suite.

Attaching a patch 'derby-514-buildfiles-v1.diff' which adds the build files for upgrade tests. This patch also adds the properties file for upgrade test which specifies not to run with security manager as more work is needed in this area (DERBY-1135).
This patch affects upgrade tests only. This is an incremental patch and does not resolve the issue fully. Please take a look at this patch. Thanks.
